dc_title_s: Map of the territory of the United States from the Mississippi River to the Pacific Ocean
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: Map of the territory of the United States from the Mississippi River to the Pacific Ocean
dc_description_s: Map of the territory of the United States from the Mississippi River to the Pacific Ocean ordered by Jeff'n Davis, Secretary of War to accompany the reports of the explorations for a railroad route : made in accordance with the 10th & 11th sections of the Army Appropriation Act of March 3rd 1853; Relief shown by hachures. Shows Indian tribal locations, military posts, and routes and dates of expeditions and surveys. Includes "Authorities." "Note" states it is updated to May 1, 1857. 103 x 114 cm
b1g_keyword_sm: Pacific Railroads Explorations and Surveys Maps
